name: Sports Story
overview: Sports Story is a 2022 video game developed and published by Sidebar Games for the Nintendo Switch. It is the sequel to the 2017 video game Golf Story. It was released on 23 December 2022. Originally announced in December 2019, Sports Story suffered delays as the scope of the game became more ambitious. Upon release the game received mixed reviews, with criticism directed towards the game's overuse of fetch quests, its unfocused narrative, and technical issues experienced at launch, with most critics finding the game to be inferior to Golf Story.
